description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother.
title: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED
author: Jennette McCurdy

description: An account of time spent in the Trump White House by the former president’s son-in-law and senior adviser.
title: BREAKING HISTORY
author: Jared Kushner

description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE
author: Bessel van der Kolk

description: A biography of the late Princess of Wales and her sons.
title: DIANA, WILLIAM, AND HARRY
author: James Patterson and Chris Mooney

description: The life story of the Olympic athlete, All-American football player and Major League Baseball player Jim Thorpe.
title: PATH LIT BY LIGHTNING
author: David Maraniss

description: The daughter of a Korean mother and Jewish-American father, and leader of the indie rock project Japanese Breakfast, describes creating her own identity after losing her mother to cancer.
title: CRYING IN H MART
author: Michelle Zauner

description: A botanist and member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation espouses having an understanding and appreciation of plants and animals.
title: BRAIDING SWEETGRASS
author: Robin Wall Kimmerer

description: A memoir about growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show.”
title: BORN A CRIME
author: Trevor Noah

description: A law professor and MacArthur grant recipient’s memoir of his decades of work to free innocent people condemned to death.
title: JUST MERCY
author: Bryan Stevenson

description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
title: EDUCATED
author: Tara Westover

description: The late feminist icon explores the causes of a polarized society and the meaning of love.
title: ALL ABOUT LOVE
author: bell hooks

description: The multiple award-winning actress describes the difficulties she encountered before claiming her sense of self and achieving professional success.
title: FINDING ME
author: Viola Davis

description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years.
title: GREENLIGHTS
author: Matthew McConaughey

description: The author of “The Oregon Trail” recounts his adventures on a wooden flatboat and challenges the myths of American expansion.
title: LIFE ON THE MISSISSIPPI
author: Rinker Buck

description: An approach to dealing with trauma that shifts an essential question used to investigate it.
title: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU?
author: Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
